CustomField.description: Allows you to switch your preferred method of managing visible fields on the Timecard Entry page. If False, PSA will use configuration options or custom settings to configure the UI. If True, PSA will use field sets to configure the UI.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Allows you to switch your preferred method of managing visible fields on the Timecard Entry page. If False, PSA will use configuration options or custom settings to configure the UI. If True, PSA will use field sets to configure the UI.
CustomField.label: Use Field Set for Timecard UI
